ANDORLINI Isabella, Franco LUCARELLI e Pier Andrea MANDÒ, Particle-Induced X Ray-Emission for the Analysis of Writing and Painting Materials on Papyri and Textiles from Graeco-Roman Egypt. Avec résumé en anglais.
